name: FACTORY MUTUAL RESEARCH CORP. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator
name_abbreviation: Factory Mutual Research Corp. v. Norberg

parties: FACTORY MUTUAL RESEARCH CORP. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The petition for writ of certiorari is denied.

attorneys: Hinckley & Allen, H. Peter Olsen, Mark A. Dingley, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk-Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Perry Shat-kin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
FACTORY MUTUAL RESEARCH CORP. v. John H. NORBERG, Tax Administrator.
No. 82-158-M.P.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
April 29, 1982.
Hinckley & Allen, H. Peter Olsen, Mark A. Dingley, Providence, for plaintiff-respondent.
Dennis J. Roberts II, Atty. Gen., Melanie Wilk-Spencer, Asst. Atty. Gen., Perry Shat-kin, Chief Legal Officer (Taxation), Providence, for defendant-petitioner.
